title: 'They seized everything': Yemen's Houthi rebels drive aid groups to the brink
summary_full: Aid groups - a lifeline for millions of Yemenis - are being squeezed out of existence in areas under the control of the rebels, the BBC hears.
summary_public: Aid groups - a lifeline for millions of Yemenis - are being squeezed out of existence in areas under the control of the rebels, the BBC hears.
